briefTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Herpes Zoster Vaccine GSK1437173A When Co-administered With Prevenar13 in Adults Aged 50 Years and Older
officialTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Herpes Zoster Vaccine GSK1437173A When Co-administered With Prevenar13 in Adults Aged 50 Years and Older
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess immunogenicity and safety of GSK Biologicals' HZ vaccine when its first dose is co-administered with a pneumococcal polysaccharide conjugate vaccine (Prevenar13) in adults aged â‰¥50 YOA, as compared to the control group where the two HZ/su doses are administered subsequent to Prevenar13.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With a Vaccine Response for Anti-glycoprotein E (Anti-gE) in Co-Ad Group
